infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to show you nearby rejection challenges and help you discover quests in your area.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need your location to show you nearby rejection challenges and help you discover quests in your area.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera access is required to record optional challenge verification videos and take photos for your quest stories. We do not record without your explicit action.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access is required for voice quest recordings and live streaming features. Audio is only recorded when you explicitly start recording.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo library access is needed to select images for your quest stories and profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Photo library write access is needed to save quest completion photos to your gallery.
